DOC.brief_summary: The Cohort Swedish Men begin 1997 , men born 1918 1952 reside two county central Sweden receive questionnaire include 350 item concern diet lifestyle factor . A second questionnaire send 2008-09 .
DOC.detailed_description: The Cohort Swedish Men establish 1997 , men born 1918 1952 reside Västmanland Örebro counties central Sweden receive questionnaire concern diet lifestyle factor . Of 100,303 eligible men , 48,850 ( 49 % ) respond questionnaire . The questionnaire include item diet , physical activity , medical history , lifestyle factor cigarette smoke history use dietary supplement . During 2008-09 , exposure information update extended send two new questionnaire - one questionnaire health include several sign symptom , sleep , social relation etc ( 2008 ) one diet , dietary supplement use , lifestyle factor ( 2009 ) . Majority question questionnaire validate . Incident case cancer ascertain record linkage study population National Swedish Cancer Register Regional Cancer Registers . Cardiovascular disease well surgery cause death identify linkage National Inpatient registries Swedish Board Health Welfare . Ascertainment cancer case diseases almost 100 % complete . Dates death ascertain Swedish Death Register ( 100 % complete ) , information date move study area obtain linkage Swedish Population Register .
DOC.criteria: All men bear 1918 1952 , live central Sweden
